content.detailedDescription: I work outside on the graveyard shift.  on a clear february night, appx 1am, i noticed a relatively large orange orb in the sky.  the orb came from behind a hill appx 1mile away then went into the air appx 1000ft, then hovered for maybe 20seconds.  next the orb turned south 45% and flew away, probably as fast as a fighter jet.  this exact orb experience happened again once a min for appx 30min.  so a total of appx 30 orange orbs doing the same flight pattern, but slightly varied.  you could see 1-2 orbs at any one time.  after appx 10min two other individuals approached and watch the final 20 or so orbs do the same thing.
content.summary: 1 vehicle sized orange orb come from pudget sound water into the sky then fly away, 1 a min for 30min

content.detailedDescription: I was just trying to smoke outside while lightning up the smoke i noticed bright shiny orb in the sky and my eyes got stuck on it. thought of it as some kind of orb which was shiny chrome color. i had no idea what it could be.But it wasnt something i ever saw before.. the orb was staying still for a while then moved in different geometrical shapes and signs and it just stops again and repeats. after that speed was faster than laser and moved in long distances left and right. then i lost the sight after the object went behind the trees and i couldnt see after that i tried to look but it was missing then.. i was confused. i was focused and shocked.. and exicited
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: The orb was hovering everywhere direction with ultra fast speed and then stops for couple of seconds

content.detailedDescription:
2017.2.22 around 7:54 pm
orb of light:
spotted it in the night vision camera lcd, tracked it weaving about from west to south east, looked away from camera to see, and it was visible to naked eye (bright as a star), disappeared behind tree line, this is when i lost track with the night vision.
optical specs: handy cam mounted to a mantis gen 3 night vision scope.
assessment: appears like bird or bat flight, but besides there no bugs to feed on in february, my eyes are not that good, and the lighting too consistent for it to be lit from passing car head lights..
raw footage & enhanced footage included..
excuse the language in the video... i couldn't contain myself...
content.summary: Caught on night vision, visible to naked eye.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting by my window looking out at the stars, as i do every night. i was looking out by la palma cause i noticed something a little larger than a star, to be honest i thought it was a bright star at first but it wasn't because i saw multiple & they moved opposite directions a lot really fast & disappeared i was in shock because the first thing that came in mind was a ufo then i came too my senses a little bit & thought i was overthinking it because it could just be a plane but,then all of a sudden i look out again too see them right over where they was but, there was more, by now theirs 8 bright objects moving very fast & disappearing. i was scared in the moment i called my friends freaking out they told me too calm down & i might just be seeing things but, i know i wasn't, also, i left my room for a minute & i came back & felt as if i wasn't alone anymore.. i got so freaked out & left my room for the night & slept in the living room.
content.summary: sitting by my window lookin out by la palma & i seen multiple lights coming & going.

content.detailedDescription: I just went flying the drone and saw very fast object in the air. it flew over a distance about 500-1000 meters in 0,43 second. its visible in 13-14 frames in 30 fps video. there was completely silent in that region, no poligons, no fireshots, no meteors falls nor explosions. i cannot explain that so i write to you. you can see it here: [link removed/cms/dr]
content.summary: Very fast object - like large bullet. [link removed\cms\dr]

content.detailedDescription: Tree top high two red lights coming straight at us real low changed into 4-5 objects in design of triangle and lowder then a stun gun 10,000x electricity popping sounding electricity you want to see the video look me up on rick valle  i have the video posted under my name on youtube
content.summary: Tree top high two red lights coming straight at us real low changed into 4-5 objects in design of triangle and lowder then a stun gun 10,000x electricity popping sounding

content.detailedDescription:
I live on the ocean, at about 10:30pm on till about 1pm.  i observe usually on a nightly basis a large amount of ufo activity.  i noticed none looking boats in the ocean and have a nikon p900 and focused  in on strange shaped ships.  around the ships where 3-4 drones flying around the crafts.  also, i had the feeling there was something in the clouds as i had a feeling there was something in them.  all of a sudden out of the clouds came two huge orbs.  i videotaped a good portion of the night including this which resembled archon type vessels.  everything seemed to be around the cloud so i assumed they were out in the ocean at night.  i had the feeling they where researching or monitoring something.  the ocean looks a different color these days.   i think it is dying.  

i had two interactions with two type orbs and a metallic type ship or drones with an aqua green light that came across my balcony and sat there and watched me... i put out love and hoped for the best and hoped they could show me how to repair our planet.  i have all of this on video.  

the drones looked like helicopters but they made no noise.. at times i saw a jet, but it would fly out and then float and fly around the area...  i just could not video all of what was going on.. to much. 

it seems lately to be going on for the last few evenings.  i got a photo yesterday of a huge square in the clouds.  so my guess it was them.  i can verify all of this and have the photo of a cloaked something in the sky in the shape of a huge rectangle.. not many of those in the sky.  

after 2 hours or so.. i went in and they all seem to leave.. when i went out...The place seemed to come alive...When i would go in.. it would go dim....Weird?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I live on ocean, there was a possible ship cloaked in clouds, things came out of clouds and were on ocean with drones flying around for protection as a guess

content.detailedDescription: While driving a group of athletes back to roswell from capitan, nm on tuesday, april 19, 2016 travelling east on us380 just outside of lincoln,nm, i observed about a dozen white lights to my se about 70 degrees above the hills. the lights appeared stationary in some random formation and seemed  to operate in unison. they would disappear and then reappear in a split second seemingly in a slightly different location or changed formation. this observation lasted between 10-15 seconds when the lights finally disappeared. i have never seen anything like it before or since. i did not have any sense how much area these lights occupied or the altitude, but they had to be at least 1000 feet up since hey we're above the hills that boarder the valley that the village of lincoln is in.
content.summary: About a dozen white lights randomly in formation would simultaneously disappear and reappear

content.detailedDescription:
April 22nd, 2017 at 1:21 pm, taking pictures with a high-quality digital camera and lens at tuzigoot national monument in cottonwood, az.    pictures were taken less than 1 minute apart, as shown in time and date stamp revealed that in first picture scene was normal, in 2nd picture many transparent-looking, orb-shaped lights are revealed in picture.   pictures taken minutes before and after of members in our tour party were normal like the the first picture of the doorway scene.  none of us saw the lights, orbs or anything else unusual until reviewing the pictures on the digital camera a few minutes later.  

the questionnaire here is for objects, so some answers really don't apply.   still needed to submit answers in order to submit the online report.   for instance, question about 'prominent colors' want an exterior or interior description - but this does not apply to the phenomenon that appeared in the digital photo results.   color appears to be white or translucent.
content.summary: 2 pictures taken within one minute.   one without orb lights - one with.  only visible when reviewed.

content.detailedDescription: When i went outside it was at night getting a smoke i saw 4 to 5 yellow orbs i thought it was the moon but it wasn't it shaped like the moon due to cloud cover like a crescent moon the ufo broke up into four or five orbs not sure. then it was absorbing the orbs and took off.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 4 to 5 orbs some being absorbed then took off came back took off again

content.detailedDescription: I was heading north on hwy 97 and turned left on sw veterans way facing west where i was stopped at a traffic light. while waiting for the light to turn green i was looking at the pretty sunset and a very bright white light caught my attention. i saw this and thought it was a plane, but it was much smaller than a plane and so bright. it looked cigar shaped and seem to be staying still in the sky. i stared at it for about a minute and then it suddenly vanished as if it was using some kind of camouflage. it was at a great distance from me because it appeared like a dash in the sky, but the light was so bright and caught my attention in daylight. how it vanished is what was so shocking - it seemed to just disappear without any movement. i was very excited and couldn't stop looking for it on my way home, but it was gone. i have never seen anything like this before in real life. i ran in the door to tell my wife and she of course looked at me like i was crazy, but i had to share this amazing moment i had.
content.summary: Bright white light/object in sky hovers and then vanishes as if using camouflage.

content.detailedDescription: I was at our local safeway waiting for my wife and thought i would try out my new nikon p900 camera.At first i thought i was seeing mosquitos and the camera wasn't focusing properly.My wife got to the car and i stopped recording, said what am i looming at,  later a day or to later i looked at the video and saw what looks to be lights in the sky. not worried though i see them often.
content.summary: Was at safeway parking lot ,was trying out my new camera, happen to look south at clouds and shot the video.New nikon p900.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my local gym in nyc doing pilates on my mat, starting out the large windows  when a large cylinder shaped ufo appeared in sky that was moving towards the east overhead it rotating like drill with 4 lights only on 1 side and they would only show on that side after it made a full rotation soon after it appeared 3-4 small
saucer or sphere type ufos were bliping in and out around it following it.  this thing was clear as day of what i saw and it looked exactly as the ufo that was filmed in uk by officers. rotated just like it and off axis, same light pattern as it rotated.  this thing had to be hundreds of feet long.  it definitely was in sky for what i viewed for over 5 minutes and then after it all passed overhead i was not able to view it any longer.  i have video and photos below but man iphone doesn't explain the vividness of what my eyes saw.
content.summary: Cylinder shaped ufo rotating on axis like had at least 4 lights or windows that reflected light on 1 side as it rotated like drill followed by 3 to 4 saucer/sphere type ufos

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my apartment looking for satellites when i saw the object. it was a dark and triangle shaped. it had 3 greenish white lights on the corners and a red pulsating light on the back end. it made no noise. it was flying across the sky in a straight line effortlessly. it reminded me of how an air hockey puck slides across an air hockey table. it appeared to be flying fairly low to the ground. the green lights, though not very bright, had a fuzzy haze around their edge that made them hard to look at. i watched it for about 8-10 seconds until it appeared to vanish into thin air. shook up, i went inside and locked all my doors. a few years later i started a job inspecting aerospace parts, mostly military, for cracks under uv lights. it dawned on me recently when inspecting titanium parts under a uv light, i see the same fuzzy haze effect that the object had. this fuzz effect very hard on the eyes, so we use uv blocking glasses to inspect titanium parts. if the lights on the craft were uv and if the craft was made of titanium, it would explain the this fuzz i witnessed. i thought what i saw that night could very possibly be military. i informed my manager that i may have solved the mystery of this craft i saw. he responded by telling me that if it was military, that it would most likely be painted and you wouldn't be able to see any fuzz and that titanium parts are almost always internal. i also have never heard of a ufo with a sweet paint job, either. i started thinking about titanium in general. it's the strongest metal on earth, it doesn't corrode, and it would probably be the best material to use for an anti-gravity interstellar craft traveling long distances.
content.summary: Dark triangle with 3 green lights on the corners and a red pulsating light on the rear end.

content.detailedDescription:
1 16th floor balcony
2  erratic movement over large distance  
3  initially thought it was a star
4  it was an erratic with rapid horizontal & vertical movements
5 it was unlike anything we have seen
6 it went south behind the building
content.summary: Ufo had a bright red flashing light that aattracted iur attn in the evening sky because of its erratic rapid movements over a great distance d

content.detailedDescription: At holden beach, nc a bright yellow light appeared in the sky that caught my attention. after watching it slowly  move in odd directions 2 more appeared nearby. they all went almost in unison the same directions and then went in their own way and disappeared near the water.
content.summary: One bright light yellow white appeared going in odd directions that caught my attention, then 2 more appeared. then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in living room watching tv. it was about 4:25 in the afternoon. all of a sudden, the house went dark, from no sunlight coming into the windows. my daughter was in the kitchen at the time and asked me, what was that. i jumped up and went outside immediately to see what couldve caused it. i found nothing in the sky that would have caused a shadow
 no clouds today, and no planes visible. also, totally silent outside. no motor or jet noises
i believe whatever it was had to be huge to cast a shadow large enough to darken the whole house at once. also, had to be moving very fast as the entire incident lasted 1 second. i do not believe it was a cloud, because it did not darken gradually, it was instantaneous. and again,no clouds in sky, wind was about 10 mph today.
content.summary: Was in house, everything went dark for 1 second.

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out for witness from a letter sent to mufon headquarters, by field investigator l. flechtner 18809, on july 19th, 2017
i tried three times to call the witness but the phone was busy, i wanted to get more details to fill out on the report. print screened the original letter and attached it on the bottom
------------------------------------------------------------------

all i know is what i saw along with my older brother, and my mother in the winter of 1953. i walked to within fifty feet of a very unusual object. back then, ufos as they have come to be called, was not part of our terminology. 
it was a late winter night 9 or 10 pm. my mother heard our dog growling, we listened and heard a humming noise. it was high pitched and then went down low in volume then back up to a high pitch. we thought it was the radio, and then the refrigerator. she then opened the back door to look out. she was looking towards the far end of our yard about 200' where normally it 
 opened up to a large open field, but in this instance there was a string of lights abut 8 to 10' apart and the humming was now low and steady. there was a slight blink to the lights. it seemed it had a saucer shape and the middle was rotating. as it rotated a solid part momentarily covered the lighted windows, causing a blinking sensation. my mother, brother and i moved towards it to within 50' trying to figure out what it was. my dog hid behind us, not at all like him. mom decided we needed to go into the house and go to bed. the next day their was 6 to 8 inches of snow on the ground. the snow was depressed where the saucer was hovering, but strangely not melted.
content.summary: In the winter of 1953 we saw a saucer shaped craft hovering in our backyard.

content.detailedDescription: I was siting outside and west to our shed but then i saw a v shaped object heading east and it was very shinny and silver in colour i shouted to my family outside saying there's a ufo. they all ran rover and seen it then i ran inside as fast as i could to get my ipad and take a photo. i ran back outside and took some photos and watched as it went east and i eventually lost sight of it so now i'm writeing this.
content.summary: It looked very out of place

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming back from a ride on my motorcycle (road cruiser), headed home there is a long street called ashley street, very straight road about 2km long. i was on ashley st casualty riding when i realised no one else was on the road infront or behind me which i thought was odd as it is a popular road and usually quite busy that time of day. i decided to slow down a bit and enjoy the ride (no traffic). 

i suddenly felt compelled to look up and towards the sky to my right (south west) the sun was not long past its zenith so i got a clear look at this thing.

i initially thought it was a silver balloon i noticed it when i was exactly adjacent to the object about 35 meters away and roughly 35 maybe 40 meters in the air. still riding i did a double take as it had not moved in terms of floated higher, or drifted away out to the gulf.

i dont know why but i slowed down but did not stop to keep looking at this thing. i then started to think drone or rc balloon. still looking (my speed now 50kmp) it seemed to dance up and down only a few feet and started to morph shape from a solid oval, to a perfect spear then to what i could describe as a tear drop (horizontally) then repeated this vertically and horizontally again (the shape changing) all the while not moving more than a few feet up or down left or right. 

i returned my eyes to the road and rounded the corner onto mimosa st and pulled over to scan the sky in the direction i saw the object, gone.

my initially feels were a deep sense of curiosity then when it started to change shape i became giggly?   this "funny" feeling left within seconds then i had an overwhelming sense of safety/security about me, i can best describe this feeling like when you're a young child and you're drifting off to sleep on the couch with father sitting next to you, sort of like a confident "everythings going to be okay" feeling. 


i still have my doubts but what makes me think it was an ufo be it alien or government was the timing and the odd emotions i experienced.
content.summary: Silver/chrome appearance, morphed shape, remained at roughly equal elevation, seemed to be dancing

content.detailedDescription:
He event was on 5 jul 17, and this happened to a good friend of mine and his wife.  my friend had fallen asleep on his recliner in the living room. his wife was in their bedroom watching tv and they have a large window behind the head board of there bed. she states she "heard voices" coming from that side of there house. this is the left side of there house. there house's front door faces due east, back yard faces due west. she ran into the living room, woke up my friend and he went outside to investigate.

he went into the back yard along with there 5 year old basset hound. the dog immediately ran to the left side of there house, started barking like crazy, running the full length of that side of the house from the front gate to the end of the house. but while the dog was running back and forth and back and forth the dog kept looking up at the sky when it was barking. my friend never saw anything or heard anything. then the next day he checked his security system and had the enclosed video recorded. transferred a copy of it to his computer.

on the video, the circular light at the 3 o'clock position is a known street light. the bright light in the center and the two small lights at the 1 o'clock position are house lights. been verified two nights later. but the light we want you to investigate is the light at the 9 o'clock position.

notice what happens when you start the video! bye the way you are looking due west.  the video camera used according to my friend is a d link 942l ip wireless camera.

the reason i stress the direction is that due east over the mountains which by the way are approx 25 miles away is facing towards white sands missile range. due west is the town of las cruces nm.

could you run this video against any video enhancing software you might have to get a better video. also my friend is real interested in the luminosity of the strange light.

notice before you run the video it looks like a square light with a circular light on top of it.
content.summary: Square with a circle on it. over 10 seconds of footage went bright then video ended.

content.detailedDescription: 3 friends and i were swimming in sweetwater lake and all noticed two towers with one light rise above the horizon, over the course of a number of minutes more lights were turned on and a third tower rose making a grid-like pattern of 3 towers with three lights each. this brightly illuminated the sky for a short number of minutes. after illuminating the sky there was a trail of mist or steam left in the sky and all 3 towers of lights disappeared beyond the horizon, shortly after the middle tower rose back up, with only the top light on, and once again disappeared shortly after. initially, the 4 of us believed the lights to be fireworks, but then did not act at all like conventional fireworks. it should also be noted that there was very little or no sound associated with the event.
content.summary: 3 towers of light rise above horizon, brighten sky, descend back under the horizon

content.detailedDescription: I was living in a tri level house at the time i was watching tv and i got up to grab a cigarette i smoke out the window on top floor of the house so i can see everything it's in a rural area so you can see all the stars. anyways i was looking off too the west cause that's the way the window faces i saw this really bright star i thought, until it got super bright and started changing colors and moving in all directions i was like no way i'm seeing this right so i i called for my husband too look out the window too he doesn't believe in ufos or anything like me i've seen a lot of weird things anyways it was way above tree line at first moving left and right very fast motions then slowed down almost like it knew i was watching it  it changed colors from green to blue to red to blue then really bright white and just kept going on that pattern as it was above tree line it slowly started to go down. i know it wasn't a plan or helicopter i see them all the time i know what they look like! this was way different planes don't move like this or helicopters and i saw a plane to the left of the object and the object appeared way different was bigger to the naked eye so after me and my husband looked at it for about 10 mins it slowly drifted below tree line and was gone my husband thinks it was a star but for a week straight same time every night i looked for that so called star it was never seen so i don't believe it was a star at all it was something and i still look to the sky every night hoping i can catch it on video next time.
content.summary: Saw it above tree lines going in all directions blinking different colors slowly fell thru trees and gone

content.detailedDescription: Mum called me to the balcony in a hurry asking me about what the orb of light she was seeing was. i thought it was the iss though i rapidly realized that it isn't because i've seen a flyover of the iss before and it isn't similar. this was a rather aspirin sized object with intense yellow orange glow almost fiery surrounded by a ring of light coming from south east slowly at a constant speed towards the east for like 4 minutes. the light was fainting gradually as it moved then disappeared.
content.summary: Yellow orange orb with halo hovering then following a curved path slow speed

content.detailedDescription: I had just laid down on my bed (it was still somewhat light out, it was dusk) and reached up to turn on my radio while looking out my open window. something straight above the house caught my eye. it was disk shaped, had no wings, no running lights and had a strobe type light on it's domed top. just as i realized it wasn't a conventional aircraft it took off in a flash heading due east and was gone in a manner of seconds. i spent 4 years in the navy and stood many a lookout watch night & day reporting anything moving in the sky. i know it was a solid object (gray in color) shaped like the classic "flying saucer"..Inverted pie tin with a domed top. i have witnessed abnormal lights high in the daytime sky in this area in the past, once also observed by 4 neighbors. i know what i saw, it was real and either secret u.S. aircraft, or something not of this world.   that's my story.
content.summary: Just laid down on my bed, reached to turn on my radio while looking out my opened window, i noticed an object straight above my house, no wings, no running lights, moving slow at first, then as i determined it wasn't a conventional aircraft, it took off

content.detailedDescription:
The object went fro s/w to s/e and made no noise..My daughter said it was probably a chinese lantern floating, but it was going from e to w and the wind always comes up from the states from the s/e...It would have turned the object in the direction of the wind if it were a chinese lantern.

one blow up picture i included show a donut shape and you could see the sky trough it at times...It travelled about maybe 500 feet above ground and had no flashing lights like a plane..It had a metallic cone shaped top and what looked like a glass cylinder center and what looked like 2 metallic tubes under the object as tv cable and then a telephone cable.

hope it is of sum interest to mufon.
content.summary: Moved about 20-25 mh

content.detailedDescription:
July 18, 2017. 9:25 p.M.
last night after  dinner and conversation with 2 of my friends in town i  headed home. it was 9:25 pm when i slowed to make a 90 degree turn onto the road where my house is. i happened to look up into the sky, a very clear space above the road at that point with no trees blocking the view, and there were no clouds, and as i gazed briefly i slammed on the brakes ( i was only doing about 25 mph to turn) because a star like bright light just popped into existence in the sky where i was looking.  it looked like a magical appearance. 

all of this happened very quickly, and i thought “hell it’s them!” but then i thought “maybe it’s a comet, or a shooting star? but it was sitting still, and it had no tail. then after about half a second it shot across the sky, and to me it looked like it moved 6 feet, which of course was much more than six feet, and then it just disappeared! no tail, no sound, and it didn’t dip down, it moved completely in a horizontal line parallel to the earth. so in about 2 or 3 seconds, it appeared, stayed there a second, then shot across the sky and instantly vanished. it didn’t disappear behind clouds or trees. it was in wide open sky.

this morning i found no marks, punctures, or bruises, so apparently they did not visit me.

i felt elated briefly after seeing it. and also a bit dazed. i didn't care to tell anyone about it when it happened.
content.summary: A light appeared out of no where, then zipped across the sky for 1 or 2 seconds, then just disappeared into thin air.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a clear sunny cloud less morning and went out on balcony for a coffee.
my partner who was lying on her bed with sluding door open with her head upside down to talk to me asked what that was behind me in the sky.
after waiting a while to see if it was moving, we realized it wasn't a plane and too high for a drone. we thought maybe a satellite but that would of eventually moved.
after around 25 minutes it was still there and we asked a man walking down the street what he thought it was and he couldn't say either.
so we have left it as unexplained but have several videos of it.
content.summary: Bright reflective multiple lights hovering over same area for over 20 minutes

content.detailedDescription: Wanted to give this to my case worker. i totally forgot about it. and phone broke so i don't have his number.
content.summary: Bruise from abduction??

content.detailedDescription: Walking my dog on barmouth beach, my son took some photos and after uploading them to the computer i noticed this orb like object on several of them. i put it down to glare from the sun, however a few weeks ago a friend posted some pictures on fb of an identical orb like phenomena, stating they had witnessed the object visually.
content.summary: Not observed at the time, only noticed object after uploading photos.
